params.name: Pro Plan
params.description: Professional tier with advanced features, priority support, and team collaboration tools

params.name: Starter Plan
params.description: Perfect for individuals and small teams getting started

params.name: Business Plan
params.description: Built for growing teams that need advanced security, SSO, and dedicated account management

params.name: Enterprise Plan
params.description: Custom-tailored solution for large organizations with on-premise deployment options

params.name: API Access Add-on
params.description: Unlock full REST and GraphQL API access for custom integrations

params.name: Advanced Analytics Add-on
params.description: Real-time dashboards, custom reports, and data export capabilities

params.name: Extra Storage Pack
params.description: Add 100GB of cloud storage to any plan

params.name: White-Glove Onboarding
params.description: Dedicated onboarding specialist, data migration, and 4 weeks of hands-on training

params.name: Team Training Workshop
params.description: Full-day live training session for up to 20 team members

params.name: Team Training Weekend
params.description: Full-weekend live training session for up to 200 team members

params.name: Premium Support
params.description: 4-hour response SLA, dedicated Slack channel, and monthly review calls

params.name: Security & Compliance Pack
params.description: SOC 2 audit logs, IP allowlisting, advanced threat detection, and compliance dashboards

params.name: Mobile App Access
params.description: Native iOS and Android companion apps with offline mode and push notifications

params.name: Data Migration Service
params.description: Full-service migration from any competing platform including data validation and rollback plan

params.name: Custom Branding Pack
params.description: White-label solution with custom domain, logos, color scheme, and email templates

params.name: AI Copilot
params.description: AI-powered assistant for automated workflows, smart suggestions, and natural language queries

params.name: Team Seats Pack (10)
params.description: Add 10 additional team member seats to your organization

params.name: Solutions Consulting
params.description: One hour of expert consulting for architecture review, optimization, or custom development

params.name: 99.99% Uptime SLA
params.description: Enhanced SLA with 99.99% availability guarantee and financial credits for downtime

params.name: Audit Log & Data Export
params.description: Comprehensive audit logging with automated exports to S3, GCS, or Azure Blob Storage

params.name: Sandbox Environment
params.description: Isolated sandbox environment for testing integrations, staging deployments, and QA workflows
